description:
The meeting is organized by OWASP Chapter Vienna

As it suits UK hours - please find below the details of the meetup - for those interested to join.

Talk Details:
Title: Do you even pentest bro?,
Speaker: Daniel Cuthbert
Abstract: Introducing the OWASP Application Security Verification Standard (ASVS) and why it solves world peace, makes appsec oh so easy and helps us all

Youtube streaming: https://www.youtube.com/watch?reload=9&v=D4Zjin4hDno

Original meetup details can be found at:
https://www.meetup.com/OWASP-Vienna-Chapter/events/270688764/
title: Virtual meeting: Do you even pentest bro?
